title: Explicitly specify VS Bootstrapper versions
body:
This should lock to a a "lower" but newer version.

Fixes a CG alert.

commit.message:
Explicitly specify VS Bootstrapper versions

This should lock to a a "lower" but newer version.

nodes.body: This is what we're looking for: https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=6384630&view=logs&j=bb592630-4b9d-53ad-3960-d954a70a95cf&t=8d476875-795f-5c77-cf65-737e1b92a4ce
Do not merge even though approved because we think we can get a fix from the VS eng team to preempt this
